name: Creators' Last Stand: Battle Bot Builder
name_original: Creators' Last Stand: Battle Bot Builder
description:
Creators' Last Stand Battle Bot Builder is a 3rd-person strategy shooter inspired by Valkyria Chronicles where you play as a custom-built robot in a war against the ever-evolving gray goo. Select from a variety of arms, legs, torsos, and guns to dramatically change how your character performs. Additionally, changing the head allows you to play as one of three unique personalities, each with its own story. During the day, you will fight in a squad against gray goo on one of three distinctive maps, which requires you to make use of your stamina bar and magazine size. At night you will sit around your squad's campfire and learn more about the characters, especially the combat engineer that maintains your robot. Lastly, the game has sound effects, music, custom spritework, and cutscenes to remain engaging from the first deployment to the last stand.

So get GOCKED and PRIMED, BITCH.

WASD to move

Press X to enter Shoot mode

Right click Aim

Left click Fire

If anything breaks exit to main menu and it should bring you to the same battle as before

Content Warnings:

Death

Swears

Dark themes
